notes.description:
Clarify the confusion between Service the term and `service` the angular method and to explain the 5 different Service recipes in Angular.
Clarify the confusion between Service the term and `service` the angular method and to explain the 5 different Service recipes in Angular.
notes.title: Service Service? Really Angular?
notes.content: There are 5 Recipes used to create a Service. One of those *was* unfortunately named, Service. So yes, amongst its fellow peers such as Provider Service and Factory Service, there is in fact a Service Service.

notes.description:
Define Service
Clarify the confusion between Service the term and `service` the angular method and to explain the 5 different Service recipes in Angular.

Clarify the confusion between Service the term and `service` the angular method and to explain the 5 different Service recipes in Angular.
notes.title: What is a Service
notes.content: Service: Angular services are objects that are wired together using dependency injection (DI). You can use services to organize and share code across your app.

notes.description:
Steps for Creating a Service

notes.title: How do you create a Service?
notes.content:
You can register a service to our Angular module `app` with a one of the following 5 recipes:
 - **factory** 
 - **provider** 
 - **service** 
 - **value** 
 - **constant**

notes.description:
People are starting to ask: where can I learn about CSS Grid?

There are a lot of fantastic resources out there. When it comes to the technical how-to, most of what’s out there was written by Rachel Andrew. If you don’t know her work, take some time to get to know her and follow her.

So here are the links to resources I recommend. I will keep updating this list:

notes.description: Welcome to the world of Brooke!
notes.title: Create Note v3
notes.content:
Welcome to the world of Brooke! Here you'll find a shotgun shooting, dance shoe wearing, big weight moving, country girl that resides in Santa Cruz, CA, with my husband Marston T. Sawyers and fur baby named Riggs.

My website is designed to bring you amazing products and pure entertainment. It's my goal to motivate you to always be courageous and DIFFERENT.

Attack life without fear of failure and always remember: “Lions Never Lose Sleep Over The Opinions Of Sheep!”

notes.description: Responsible for: • Developing and implementing programs that ensure all products and services meet client requirements, in addition to company standards
notes.title: Create another one Note
notes.content:
Job Purpose
Responsible for: • Developing and implementing programs that ensure all products and services meet client requirements, in addition to company standards. • Ensuring that quality assurance and control (QA, QC) process meet organization standards in assigned department (all projects). • Managing QA team in assigned department.
